com.gamelanlabs.chimplecrowd.visualization

Class RunningScatterPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimplecrowd.visualization.RunningPlot
      • com.gamelanlabs.chimplecrowd.visualization.RunningScatterPlot

  • public class RunningScatterPlot
extends RunningPlot
    Displays a running plot of points -- call add(x, y) to add a new point, and the class will automatically update the underlying Histogram.
    Author:
    Ben
